MajorClaims.MC1: it is one's hard work that helps him reach his target
MajorClaims.MC2: I strongly believe in hard working that would not easily disappoint you as luck sometimes does

Claims.C1: I do not see any rational in believing in luck to reach one's goals
Claims.C2: depending on luck for everything is not good
Claims.C3: if you depend only on luck for all your accomplishments, you are taking a great risk
Claims.C4: all my accomplishments were backed by my hard work, not my luck
Claims.C5: those who believe in hard work are clear about their goals and know about their final destination
Claims.C6: if you work hard, luck too might shine on you and take you some more steps further ahead from your actual target

Premises.P1: it is good to be lucky
Premises.P2: Luck is something intangible and no one can guarantee that it would ever come your way
Premises.P3: If it doesn't work, it would be a great disappointment
Premises.P4: I never did encounter any disappointments of missing my goals
Premises.P5: if you strive hard to achieve what you want, then your hard work would take you at least closer to your final goal
Premises.P6: They carefully organize the process of achieving their targets and continue to evaluate their progress until they reach the final goal
Premises.P7: If you believe in luck, you would be clueless about where you are heading
Premises.P8: a friend of mine, who had severe financial constraints, had the habit of buying lottery tickets thinking that one day he would win a lottery
Premises.P9: He was living in an illusion that he can solve his financial issues with this lottery
Premises.P10: up to this day his luck has not appeared and problems have got further worsened
Premises.P11: my boss worked tirelessly for his promotion
Premises.P12: He looked at every aspect that he needed to qualify for the promotion
Premises.P13: He realized that having a master's degree would be a great credential for him to outperform his competitors
Premises.P14: he had many commitments at home and work, he somehow managed to complete this degree before he was eligible to apply
Premises.P15: At the end he was not only able to get the promotion amidst a stiff competition but also got nominated for a foreign scholarship
Premises.P16: he had more credentials than other officers in his capacity
